select `USERNAME`,`NAME`,`HEAD_PORTRAIT`,`DESCRIPT`,`ADDRESS`,`MOTTO` from user_info inner join user on user_info.USER_ID = user.ID ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5
select ID from user where USERNAME = #{username}

select `HEAD_PORTRAIT` from user_info inner join user on user_info.USER_ID = user.ID where user.USERNAME = #{username}
select REMARK_NAME from friends where friends.USER_ID=(select id from user where `user`.USERNAME=#{username})
